description:
Online food forum Gent en Garde, Belgium / sustainable food in Ghent
The online platform Gent en Garde is a meeting place on sustainable food in Ghent and has already reached more than 50,000 inhabitants of Ghent. The website lists more than 1,000 local food initiatives. There's also a Facebook group of Ghent and Garde that continues to grow.
Link to access the discussions (NL) and the online food forum of the City of Ghent, Belgium:
https://participatie.stad.gent/nl-BE/folders/gent-en-garde-projectmap
name: Online sustainable food forum Gent en Garde
